description.value: Easily remove sensitive EXIF metadata from your photos before sharing. CleanShots helps protect your privacy with a single tap, ensuring your photos are safe to send anywhere.

feature1.value: Removes EXIF data from images instantly

feature3.value: Share cleaned photos directly from the app

step1.value: Select a photo from your library or take a new one.

step2.value: Tap 'Scrub' to remove all EXIF metadata instantly.

privacyText.value: We never collect your photos or metadata. All processing happens on your device.

value.name: CleanShots-Exif Scrubber
value.description: Easily remove sensitive EXIF metadata from your photos before sharing. CleanShots helps protect your privacy with a single tap.
